title: Japanese Conversation Completion Quiz - Hard Mode
description: Complete the blanks in these Japanese conversation snippets. This quiz tests your ability to understand and use conversational Japanese effectively.
instructions: Type the appropriate word or phrase in Japanese using Romaji to complete the sentence.
The case (uppercase or lowercase) of your answer does not matter, as long as the spelling is correct.
After completing all questions, submit your answers for scoring.

items.question: Kinou, watashi wa tomodachi to _______ ni ikimashita. (Yesterday, I went to the cinema with my friend.)
Kanojo wa mainichi _______ ni kayotte imasu. (She commutes to the university every day.)
Watashi wa _______ o taberu no ga daisuki desu. (I love eating sushi.)
Kare wa _______ o yonde imasu. (He is reading a novel.)
Watashi no inu wa _______ o motte kimasu. (My dog brings the newspaper.)
Kanojo wa _______ ni itte, kaimono o shimashita. (She went to the supermarket and did some shopping.)
Watashitachi wa _______ de kaimono o shimashou. (Let's go shopping at the department store.)
Kare wa _______ de eigo o oshiete imasu. (He teaches English at a high school.)
Kono _______ wa totemo furui desu. (This temple is very old.)
Watashi wa _______ ni yotte, shashin o totte imasu. (I am taking photos by the lake.)
